group.label: National Geography Standards
group.deftn: National Geography Standards published by the National Council for Geographic Education (NCGE)

group.label: Environment and Society
group.deftn: Describes the interplay between humans and the environment

item.vocab: NCGE:Environment and Society:How human actions modify the physical environment
NCGE:Environment and Society:How physical systems affect human systems
NCGE:Environment and Society:The changes that occur in the meaning, use, distribution, and importance of resources

group.label: Human Systems
group.deftn: Identifies issues of a human impact on the Earth's surface

item.vocab: NCGE:Human Systems:How forces of cooperation and conflict among people influence the division and control of Earth's surface
NCGE:Human Systems:The characteristics, distribution, and migration of human populations on Earth's surface
NCGE:Human Systems:The characteristics, distributions, and complexity of Earth's cultural mosaics
NCGE:Human Systems:The patterns and networks of economic interdependence on Earth's surface
NCGE:Human Systems:The process, patterns, and functions of human settlement

group.label: Physical Systems
group.deftn: Describes the characteristics of the Earth's surface

item.vocab: NCGE:Physical Systems:The characteristics and spatial distribution of ecosystems on Earth's surface
NCGE:Physical Systems:The physical processes that shape the patterns of Earth's surface

group.label: Places and Regions
group.deftn: Identifies locations from a physical and human perspective

item.vocab: NCGE:Places and Regions:How culture and experience influence people's perception of places and regions
NCGE:Places and Regions:That people create regions to interpret Earth's complexity
NCGE:Places and Regions:The physical and human characteristics of places

group.label: The Uses of Geography
group.deftn: Considers the past, present and future

item.vocab: NCGE:The Uses of Geography:How to apply geography to interpret the past
NCGE:The Uses of Geography:How to apply geography to interpret the present and plan for the future

group.label: The World in Spatial Terms
group.deftn: Uses maps and analyzes people, places and the environments

item.vocab: NCGE:The World in Spatial Terms:How to analyze the spatial organization of people, places, and environments on Earth's surface
NCGE:The World in Spatial Terms:How to use maps and other geographic representations, tools, and technologies to acquire, process, and report information
NCGE:The World in Spatial Terms:How to use mental maps to organize information about people, places, and environments

group.label: NSES
group.deftn: NSES represents the National Science Education Standards

group.label: K-4
group.deftn: Pertains to content for kindergarten through 4th grade

group.label: Unifying Concepts and Processes
group.deftn: Empahsizes conceptual and procedural schemes that unify science disciplines

item.vocab: NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Change, constancy, and measurement
NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Evidence, models, and explanation
NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Evolution and equilibrium
NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Form and function
NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Systems, order, and organization

group.label: Standard A - Science as Inquiry
group.deftn: The combination of the processes of science, scientific knowledge and reasoning to understand science

item.vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard A Science as Inquiry Standards:Abilities necessary to do scientific inquiry
NSES:K-4:Content Standard A Science as Inquiry Standards:Understanding about scientific inquiry

group.label: Standard B - Physical Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of physical science

item.vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Light, heat, electricity, and magnetism
NSES:K-4:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Position and motion of objects
NSES:K-4:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Properties of objects and materials

group.label: Standard C - Life Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of life science

item.vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Characteristics of organisms
NSES:K-4:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Life cycles of organisms
NSES:K-4:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Organisms and environments

group.label: Standard D - Earth and Space Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of Earth and space science

item.vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Changes in earth and sky
NSES:K-4:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Objects in the sky
NSES:K-4:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Properties of earth materials

group.label: Standard E - Science and Technology
group.deftn: Establish connections between the natural and designed worlds and provide opportunities to develop decision-making abilities

item.vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Abilities of technological design
NSES:K-4:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Abilities to distinguish between natural objects and objects made by humans
NSES:K-4:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Understanding about science and technology

group.label: Standard F - Science in Personal and Social Perspectives
group.deftn: Develop decision-making skills in relation to personal social issues

item.vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Changes in environments
NSES:K-4:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Characteristics and changes in populations
NSES:K-4:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Personal health
NSES:K-4:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Science and technology in local challenges
NSES:K-4:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Types of resources

group.label: Standard G - History and Nature of Science
group.deftn: Emphasizes the clarification of different aspects of scientific inquiry, the human aspects of science, and the role that science has played in the development of various cultures

item.vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard G History and Nature of Science Standards:Science as a human endeavor

group.deftn: Pertains to content for 5th through 8th grade

group.label: Unifying Concepts and Processes
group.deftn: Empahsizes conceptual and procedural schemes that unify science disciplines

item.vocab: NSES:5-8:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Change, constancy, and measurement
NSES:5-8:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Evidence, models, and explanation
NSES:5-8:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Evolution and equilibrium
NSES:5-8:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Form and function
NSES:5-8:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Systems, order, and organization

group.label: Standard A - Science as Inquiry
group.deftn: The combination of the processes of science, scientific knowledge and reasoning to understand science

item.vocab: NSES:5-8:Content Standard A Science as Inquiry Standards:Abilities necessary to do scientific inquiry
NSES:5-8:Content Standard A Science as Inquiry Standards:Understanding about scientific inquiry

group.label: Standard B - Physical Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of physical science

item.vocab: NSES:5-8:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Motion and forces
NSES:5-8:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Properties and changes of properties in matter
NSES:5-8:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Transfer of energy

group.label: Standard C - Life Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of life science

item.vocab: NSES:5-8:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Diversity and adaptations of organisms
NSES:5-8:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Population and ecosystems
NSES:5-8:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Regulation and behavior
NSES:5-8:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Reproduction and heredity
NSES:5-8:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Structure and function in living systems

group.label: Standard D - Earth and Space Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of Earth and space science

item.vocab: NSES:5-8:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Earth in the solar system
NSES:5-8:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Earth's history
NSES:5-8:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Structure of the earth system

group.label: Standard E - Science and Technology
group.deftn: Establish connections between the natural and designed worlds and provide opportunities to develop decision-making abilities

item.vocab: NSES:5-8:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Abilities of technological design
NSES:5-8:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Understandings about science and technology

group.label: Standard F - Science in Personal and Social Perspectives
group.deftn: Develop decision-making skills in relation to personal social issues

item.vocab: NSES:5-8:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Natural hazards
NSES:5-8:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Personal health
NSES:5-8:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Populations, resources, and environments
NSES:5-8:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Risks and benefits
NSES:5-8:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Science and technology in society

group.label: Standard G - History and Nature of Science
group.deftn: Emphasizes the clarification of different aspects of scientific inquiry, the human aspects of science, and the role that science has played in the development of various cultures

item.vocab: NSES:5-8:Content Standard G History and Nature of Science Standards:History of science
NSES:5-8:Content Standard G History and Nature of Science Standards:Nature of science
NSES:5-8:Content Standard G History and Nature of Science Standards:Science as a human endeavor

group.deftn: Pertains to content for 9th through 12th grade

group.label: Unifying Concepts and Processes
group.deftn: Empahsizes conceptual and procedural schemes that unify science disciplines

item.vocab: NSES:9-12:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Change, constancy, and measurement
NSES:9-12:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Evidence, models, and explanation
NSES:9-12:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Evolution and equilibrium
NSES:9-12:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Form and function
NSES:9-12:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Systems, order, and organization

group.label: Standard A - Science as Inquiry
group.deftn: The combination of the processes of science, scientific knowledge and reasoning to understand science

item.vocab: NSES:9-12:Content Standard A Science as Inquiry Standards:Abilities necessary to do scientific inquiry
NSES:9-12:Content Standard A Science as Inquiry Standards:Understandings about scientific inquiry

group.label: Standard B - Physical Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of physical science

item.vocab: NSES:9-12:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Chemical reactions
NSES:9-12:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Conservation of energy and increase in disorder
NSES:9-12:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Interactions of energy and matter
NSES:9-12:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Motions and forces
NSES:9-12:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Structure and properties of matter
NSES:9-12:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Structure of atoms

group.label: Standard C - Life Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of life science

item.vocab: NSES:9-12:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Behavior of organisms
NSES:9-12:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Biological evolution
NSES:9-12:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Interdependence of organisms
NSES:9-12:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Matter, energy, and organization in living systems
NSES:9-12:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Molecular basis of heredity
NSES:9-12:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:The cell

group.label: Standard D - Earth and Space Science
group.deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of Earth and space science

item.vocab: NSES:9-12:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Energy in the earth system
NSES:9-12:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Geochemical cycles
NSES:9-12:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Origin and evolution of the earth system
NSES:9-12:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Origin and evolution of the universe

group.label: Standard E - Science and Technology
group.deftn: Establish connections between the natural and designed worlds and provide opportunities to develop decision-making abilities

item.vocab: NSES:9-12:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Abilities of technological design
NSES:9-12:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Understandings about science and technology

group.label: Standard F - Science in Personal and Social Perspectives
group.deftn: Develop decision-making skills in relation to personal social issues

item.vocab: NSES:9-12:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Environmental quality
NSES:9-12:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Natural and human-induced hazards
NSES:9-12:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Natural resources
NSES:9-12:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Personal and community health
NSES:9-12:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Population growth
NSES:9-12:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Science and technology in local, national, and global challenges

group.label: Standard G - History and Nature of Science
group.deftn: Emphasizes the clarification of different aspects of scientific inquiry, the human aspects of science, and the role that science has played in the development of various cultures

item.vocab: NSES:9-12:Content Standard G History and Nature of Science Standards:Historical perspectives
NSES:9-12:Content Standard G History and Nature of Science Standards:Nature of scientific knowledge
NSES:9-12:Content Standard G History and Nature of Science Standards:Science as a human endeavor
